original_text: “Those who are wise will instruct many, though for a time they will fall by the sword or be burned or captured or plundered.
korean_text: 백성 중에 지혜로운 자들이 많은 사람을 가르칠 것이나 그들이 칼날과 불꽃과 사로잡힘과 약탈을 당하여 여러 날 동안 몰락하리라

sentences.original_text: Those who are wise will instruct many
sentences.korean_translation: 지혜로운 자들은 많은 사람을 가르칠 것이라

sentences.original_text: though for a time they will fall by the sword
or be burned or captured or plundered
